instructions: After you've finished setting up HTC U Play , slide the Notifications panel open, and then tap the Transfer or restore your content notification. If you don't see this notification, go to Settings and then tap Backup & reset . Tap Restore from HTC backup . If the HTC Restore app is not installed on the phone, you'll be prompted to download and install HTC Restore . Tap Restore from HTC backup . Sign in with the account you used to back up your old phone. Choose the backup to restore to HTC U Play . If prompted, choose whether to use a mobile data or Wi -Fi connection for restoring your backup. Follow the onscreen instructions to restore your backup. Slide open the Notifications panel to check if there's any notification to finish restoring your backup.
